name: Tun Keltesch
title: Software Engineer
description: I build robust, efficient, and scalable software solutions, specializing in machine learning and embedded systems.
about: In 2020, I embarked on my journey as a tech enthusiast, diving deep into the world of coding and web development. Fast-forward to today, and I've had the incredible opportunity to work on a wide range of projects, from building and maintaining websites to capturing stunning aerial footage with drone technology.

Currently, I am a Junior Project Engineer at Hexagon in Vienna, Austria, where I continue to tackle new challenges and expand my expertise. I am passionate about creating unique perspectives and combining my technical skills with creativity.
I speak Luxemburgish, French, German, English, and some Portuguese, which helps me connect with a diverse range of clients and colleagues.
Contact me, and let's see how we can create something amazing together!

experience.description: Developed and maintained a Shopify website and contributed to the new version of Dyve GmbH's website, working flexibly from 8 to 30 hours a week based on project needs.

experience.jobTitle: Software Engineer · Agile Data Innovation GmbH
experience.description: Developed an attack tree visualization tool for the Frauenhofer Institut using Angular, TypeScript, and D3.js. Built AI chatbots, improved websites, and handled frontend/backend tasks for multiple projects.

experience.jobTitle: Internship (System programming lab) · Chair of Embedded Software (RWTH)
experience.description: Implemented an OS for an ATmega 644 using C. Gained hands-on experience in low-level programming and embedded systems development.

experience.jobTitle: Technical Support Specialist · Luxembourg Online S.A.
experience.description: Provided first-level support to private clients and extended support to business clients, handling internet connectivity issues. Tested and provided feedback on internal tools, enhancing knowledge of web technologies and frontend development.

education.description: Advanced level in Economics and Mathematics

projects.title: SwiftDrones Website
projects.description: A website for a drone company.

projects.title: CanvasCraft
projects.description: AI image generation tool, with accurate color pallet and style transfer.

projects.title: Text2UML
projects.description: VSCode extension for bidirectional navigation and conversion of text to UML diagrams
